queries.name: q1
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi, kas sÄkas ar 'SavienojumÄ 'â—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss ILIKE 'SavienojumÄ %' ORDER BY heading, human_key, gloss

queries.name: q2
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼vÄrdÄ ir <em>
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries WHERE heading LIKE '%<em>%' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q3
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼vÄrdÄ ir iekavasâ—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries WHERE heading LIKE '%(%' OR heading LIKE '%(%' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q4
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼vÄrdÄ ir 'arÄ«'
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries WHERE type_id in (2,3,4) AND heading LIKE '%arÄ«%' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q5
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼vÄrdÄ varbÅ«t ir gramatika
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries WHERE type_id in (2,3,4) AND heading ~ '\w\w\w\.' AND heading NOT LIKE '%<em>%' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q6
queries.caption: PaslÄ“ptas leksÄ“masâ—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.hidden = true ORDER BY e.type_id, lemma, human_key

queries.name: q7
queries.caption: PaslÄ“ptas nozÄ«mesâ—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.hidden = true ORDER BY e.type_id, gloss, human_key

queries.name: q8
queries.caption: 500 jaunÄkie Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼i
queries.sql: SELECT *, to_char(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') str_created, to_char(updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') str_updated FROM dict.entries ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 500

queries.name: q8a
queries.caption: 500 jaunÄkie vÄrdÅ¡Ä·irkÄ¼i
queries.sql: SELECT *, to_char(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') str_created, to_char(updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') str_updated FROM dict.entries e WHERE e.type_id = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 500

queries.name: q8-2
queries.caption: 50 nesen labotie Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼i
queries.sql: SELECT *, to_char(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') str_created, to_char(updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') str_updated FROM dict.entries ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 50

queries.name: q9
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar importa un skriptu piezÄ«mÄ“mâ—
queries.sql: SELECT *, data->>'ImportNotices' value1 FROM dict.entries WHERE data->'ImportNotices' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q10
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes ar importa un skriptu piezÄ«mÄ“m
queries.sql: SELECT *, s.data->>'ImportNotices' value1 FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.data->'ImportNotices' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, gloss

queries.name: q11
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar importa un skriptu piezÄ«mÄ“m
queries.sql: SELECT *, l.data->>'ImportNotices' value1 FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'ImportNotices' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q12
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar karogu 'Stils'
queries.sql: SELECT *, data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Stils' value1 FROM dict.entries WHERE data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Stils' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q14
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar Leftovers
queries.sql: SELECT *, l.data->'Gram'->'Leftovers' value1 FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Gram'->'Leftovers' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q15
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes ar Leftovers
queries.sql: SELECT *, s.data->'Gram'->'Leftovers' value1 FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.data->'Gram'->'Leftovers' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, gloss

queries.name: q16
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar Leftovers
queries.sql: SELECT *, e.data->'Gram'->'Leftovers' value1 FROM dict.entries e WHERE e.data->'Gram'->'Leftovers' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q17
queries.caption: Karogi un to vÄ“rtÄ«bas
queries.sql: SELECT f.name flag, f.is_multiple, f.scope, f.is_deprecated as f_depr, coalesce(fv.value, '-- fiksÄ“tu vÄ“rtÄ«bu nav --') as value, fv.is_deprecated as v_depr FROM dict.grammar_flag_values fv RIGHT JOIN dict.grammar_flags f ON f.id = fv.flag_id ORDER BY f.order_no, f.name, fv.order_no

queries.name: q18
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar -->
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss LIKE '%-->%' ORDER BY gloss, human_key

queries.name: q18b
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar â†’
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss LIKE '%â†’%' ORDER BY gloss, human_key

queries.name: q19
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes ierobeÅ¾ojumkandidÄti #1
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss ~ '([Pp]arasti |[Aa]rÄ« )?[Ss]avienojum(os|Ä) (ar )?' ORDER BY gloss, human_key

queries.name: q20
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar cipariem ( ) iekavÄs
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss ~ '\([\d\s,]+\)' ORDER BY gloss, human_key

queries.name: q21
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar cipariem [ ] iekavÄs
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss ~ '\[[\d\s,]+\]' ORDER BY gloss, human_key

queries.name: q22a
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i, kam Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼vÄrds nesakrÄ«t ar galveno leksÄ“mu
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id AND e.primary_lexeme_id = l.id WHERE heading <> lemma ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q22b
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i, kam Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼vÄrds nesakrÄ«t ar galveno leksÄ“mu, pretrunÄ ar Ä·eksi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id AND e.primary_lexeme_id = l.id WHERE heading <> lemma AND heading_is_primary_lexeme = true ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q23a
queries.caption: FrÄÅ¾u leksÄ“mas ar lielo burtu
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE e.type_id = 4 AND lemma ~ '^\(?[A-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄŒÅ Å½Ä¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–]' ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q23a2
queries.caption: VÄrdÅ¡Ä·irkÄ¼u leksÄ“mas ar lielo burtu, nesakrÄ«toÅ¡as ar Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼vÄrdu
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE NOT heading_is_primary_lexeme AND e.type_id = 1 AND lemma ~ '^[A-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄŒÅ Å½Ä¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–]' ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q23a3
queries.caption: FrÄÅ¾u leksÄ“mas ar lielo burtu, ne Ä«paÅ¡vÄrdi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE e.type_id = 4 AND lemma ~ '^\(?[A-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄŒÅ Å½Ä¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–]' AND (l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' IS DISTINCT FROM 'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrds') ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q23b
queries.caption: VÄrdu savienojumi ar lielo burtu
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 4 AND heading ~ '^[A-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄŒÅ Å½Ä¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–]' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q23c
queries.caption: VÄrdu savienojumi ar lielo burtu, izÅ†emot personvÄrdus un vietvÄrdus
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE e.type_id = 4 AND heading ~ '^[A-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄŒÅ Å½Ä¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–]' AND coalesce(l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids', '') <> 'PersonvÄrds' AND coalesce(l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids', '') <> 'VietvÄrds' ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q23b2
queries.caption: VÄrdÅ¡Ä·irkÄ¼i ar lielo burtu
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 1 AND heading ~ '^[A-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄŒÅ Å½Ä¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–]' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q24
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar piezÄ«mÄ“m â—
queries.sql: SELECT *, to_char(updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') str_updated FROM entries WHERE notes is NOT NULL ORDER BY updated_at DESC

queries.name: q24b
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar piezÄ«mÄ“m â€“ jautÄjumiem
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE notes LIKE '%?%' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q25a1
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i bez nozÄ«mÄ“m, bet ar MWEâ—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries e WHERE (SELECT count(*) FROM senses s WHERE s.entry_id = e.id) = 0 AND (SELECT count(*) FROM entry_relations r WHERE r.type_id = 3 AND r.entry_2_ir = e.id) > 0 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q25a2
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i bez nozÄ«mÄ“m un bez MWEâ—â—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries e WHERE (SELECT count(*) FROM senses s WHERE s.entry_id = e.id) = 0 AND (SELECT count(*) FROM entry_relations r WHERE r.type_id = 3 AND r.entry_2_ir = e.id) = 0 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q25b1
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i bez redzamÄm nozÄ«mÄ“m, bet ar MWEâ—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries e WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM senses s WHERE s.entry_id = e.id AND s.hidden = false) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM entry_relations r WHERE r.type_id = 3 AND r.entry_2_id = e.id) ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q25b2
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i bez redzamÄm nozÄ«mÄ“m un bez MWEâ—â—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries e WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM senses s WHERE s.entry_id = e.id AND s.hidden = false) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM entry_relations r WHERE r.type_id = 3 AND r.entry_2_id = e.id) ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q25c
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i bez redzamÄm leksÄ“mÄmâ—â—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries e WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM lexemes l WHERE l.entry_id = e.id AND l.hidden = false) ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q26a
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar gramatiku analÄ«zes problÄ“mu 'OriÄ£inÄlÄ gramatika satur karodziÅ†os neatÅ¡ifrÄ“tas nianses'
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Gramatiku analÄ«zes problÄ“mas' @> '["OriÄ£inÄlÄ gramatika satur karodziÅ†os neatÅ¡ifrÄ“tas nianses"]'::jsonb  ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q26b
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar gramatiku analÄ«zes problÄ“mu 'NeviennozÄ«mÄ«ga paradigma'
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Gramatiku analÄ«zes problÄ“mas' @> '["NeviennozÄ«mÄ«ga paradigma"]'::jsonb ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q26c
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar gramatiku analÄ«zes problÄ“mu 'NeviennozÄ«mÄ«ga vÄrdÅ¡Ä·ira vai kategorija'
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Gramatiku analÄ«zes problÄ“mas' @> '["NeviennozÄ«mÄ«ga vÄrdÅ¡Ä·ira vai kategorija"]'::jsonb ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q26d
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes ar gramatiku analÄ«zes problÄ“mu 'OriÄ£inÄlÄ gramatika satur karodziÅ†os neatÅ¡ifrÄ“tas nianses'
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Gramatiku analÄ«zes problÄ“mas' @> '["OriÄ£inÄlÄ gramatika satur karodziÅ†os neatÅ¡ifrÄ“tas nianses"]'::jsonb ORDER BY heading, human_key, gloss

queries.name: q27a
queries.caption: Karogs 'Kategorija' pie Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼a
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries WHERE data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Kategorija' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q27b
queries.caption: Karogs 'Kategorija' pie nozÄ«mes
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Kategorija' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, gloss

queries.name: q27c
queries.caption: Karogs 'Kategorija' pie leksÄ“mas
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Kategorija' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q28
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar tipu 'atsauce no'
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.type_id = 6 ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q29a
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar Å Ä·irkÄ¼avÄrda Ä«patnÄ«bas: Vienskaitlis
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Å Ä·irkÄ¼avÄrda Ä«patnÄ«bas' @> '["Vienskaitlis"]'::jsonb ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q29b
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar 'LeksÄ“mas pamatformas Ä«patnÄ«bas: Vienskaitlis'
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'LeksÄ“mas pamatformas Ä«patnÄ«bas' @> '["Vienskaitlis"]'::jsonb ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q30a
queries.caption: 50 nesen manis labotie Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼i
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries e WHERE e.updated_by = @@@USER_ID@@@ ORDER BY e.updated_at DESC LIMIT 50

queries.name: q30b
queries.caption: 50 nesen manis labotÄs leksÄ“mas
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.updated_by = @@@USER_ID@@@ ORDER BY l.updated_at DESC LIMIT 50

queries.name: q30c
queries.caption: 50 nesen manis labotÄs nozÄ«mes
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.updated_by = @@@USER_ID@@@ ORDER BY s.updated_at DESC LIMIT 50

queries.name: q30d
queries.caption: 50 nesen manis labotie piemÄ“ri Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼os
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.examples x JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = x.entry_id WHERE x.entry_id IS NOT NULL AND x.updated_by = @@@USER_ID@@@ ORDER BY x.updated_at DESC LIMIT 50

queries.name: q30d2
queries.caption: 50 nesen manis labotie piemÄ“ri nozÄ«mÄ“s
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.examples x JOIN dict.senses s ON x.sense_id = s.id JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE x.sense_id IS NOT NULL AND x.updated_by = @@@USER_ID@@@ ORDER BY x.updated_at DESC LIMIT 50

queries.name: q31
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar 0-to paradigmu
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.paradigm_id = 52 ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q32a
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i (vÄrdi) ar vienu vienvÄrdÄ«gu nozÄ«mi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON s.entry_id = e.id WHERE s.gloss NOT LIKE '% %' AND e.type_id = 1 AND (SELECT count(*) FROM senses WHERE entry_id = e.id) = 1 ORDER BY gloss asc

queries.name: q32b
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i (vÄrdu savienojumi) ar vienu vienvÄrdÄ«gu nozÄ«mi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON s.entry_id = e.id WHERE s.gloss NOT LIKE '% %' AND e.type_id = 4 AND (SELECT count(*) FROM senses WHERE entry_id = e.id) = 1 ORDER BY gloss asc

queries.name: q33
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar paradigmÄm
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries WHERE data->'Gram'->'Paradigms' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q34
queries.caption: Karogs 'Dzimte' pie nozÄ«mes
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Dzimte' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, gloss

queries.name: q35
queries.caption: SaÄ«sinÄjumi (e.g., 'bibl.')
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.lemma ~ '^[^ ]+\.$' ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q36
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼a tips nav vÄrdu savienojums, bet vÄrdÄ ir atstarpeâ—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries WHERE heading LIKE '% %' AND type_id <> 4 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q37
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼a tips ir vÄrdu savienojums, bet tajÄ nav atstarpesâ—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entries WHERE heading ~ '^[^ ]+$' AND type_id = 4 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q38
queries.caption: MWE saite no nozÄ«mes uz Å¡Ä·irkli, kas nav MWE
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.sense_entry_relations r JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = r.entry_id WHERE e.type_id <> 4 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q39
queries.caption: MWE saite starp Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼iem, kurai MWE galÄ nav MWE
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entry_relations r JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = r.entry_1_id WHERE r.type_id = 3 AND e.type_id <> 4 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q40
queries.caption: MWE saite starp Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼iem, kurai vÄrda galÄ nav vÄrds
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.entry_relations r JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = r.entry_2_id WHERE r.type_id = 3 AND e.type_id <> 1 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q41
queries.caption: MWE pie ne-vÄrda nozÄ«mes
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.sense_entry_relations r JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = r.entry_id JOIN dict.senses s ON s.id = r.sense_id JOIN dict.entries e2 ON e2.id = s.entry_id WHERE e2.type_id <> 1 ORDER BY e.heading, e.human_key

queries.name: q42a
queries.caption: DaudzskaitÄ¼a/vienskaitÄ¼a formas
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data #> '{Gram,Flags,Citi}' ?| array['DaudzskaitÄ¼a formas lieto vienskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“','DaudzskaitÄ¼a formas parasti lieto vienskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“','VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto daudzskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“'];

queries.name: q42b
queries.caption: VienskaitÄ¼a formas
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data #> '{Gram,Flags,Citi}' ?| array['VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto dialektos','VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto sarunvalodÄ'];

queries.name: q43a
queries.caption: DaudzskaitÄ¼a/vienskaitÄ¼a formas
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.data #> '{Gram,Flags,Citi}' ?| array['DaudzskaitÄ¼a formas lieto vienskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“','DaudzskaitÄ¼a formas parasti lieto vienskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“','VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto daudzskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“'];

queries.name: q43b
queries.caption: VienskaitÄ¼a formas
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.data #> '{Gram,Flags,Citi}' ?| array['VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto dialektos','VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto sarunvalodÄ'];

queries.name: q44
queries.caption: DaudzskaitÄ¼a/vienskaitÄ¼a formas
queries.where: x.data #> '{Gram,Flags,Citi}' ?| array['DaudzskaitÄ¼a formas lieto vienskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“','DaudzskaitÄ¼a formas parasti lieto vienskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“','VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto daudzskaitÄ¼a formu nozÄ«mÄ“']

queries.name: q45
queries.caption: VienskaitÄ¼a formas
queries.where: x.data #> '{Gram,Flags,Citi}' ?| array['VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto dialektos','VienskaitÄ¼a formas lieto sarunvalodÄ']

queries.name: q46
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar 'LeksÄ“mas pamatformas Ä«patnÄ«bas: Daudzskaitlis'
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data -> 'Gram' -> 'Flags' -> 'LeksÄ“mas pamatformas Ä«patnÄ«bas' @> '["Daudzskaitlis"]';

queries.name: q47
queries.caption: VÄrda tipa Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼i ar vismaz divÄm pamattipa leksÄ“mÄm
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key, e.heading, count(*) skaits FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id where l.type_id = 1 AND e.type_id = 1 GROUP BY e.human_key, e.heading HAVING count(*) > 1 ORDER BY skaits DESC, e.heading, e.human_key;

queries.name: q48
queries.caption: PaslÄ“ptie Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼iâ—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE hidden ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q49
queries.caption: Dubulti un vairÄkkÄrtÄ«gi vÄrdu savienojumi (sakrÄ«toÅ¡i 'Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼vÄrdi')â—â—
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 4 AND heading IN (SELECT heading FROM entries e WHERE type_id = 4 GROUP BY heading HAVING COUNT(*) > 1) ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q50a
queries.caption: Visu Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼u saraksts (vÄrdi)
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 1 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q50b
queries.caption: Visu Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼u saraksts (vairÄkvÄrdu savienojumi)
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 4 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q50b1
queries.caption: Visu Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼u saraksts (vairÄkvÄrdu savienojumi â€“ idiomas)
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 4 AND data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'VÄrdu savienojuma tips' = 'Idioma' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q50b2
queries.caption: Visu Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼u saraksts (vairÄkvÄrdu savienojumi â€“ taksoni)
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 4 AND data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'VÄrdu savienojuma tips' = 'Taksons' ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q50b3
queries.caption: Visu Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼u saraksts (vairÄkvÄrdu savienojumi â€“ pÄrÄ“jie)
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 4 AND ((data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'VÄrdu savienojuma tips' IS NULL) OR (data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'VÄrdu savienojuma tips' <> 'Taksons' AND data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'VÄrdu savienojuma tips' <> 'Idioma')) ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q50c
queries.caption: Visu Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼u saraksts (vÄrda daÄ¼as)
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entries WHERE type_id = 5 ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q51a
queries.caption: PiemÄ“ri, kuros ir vienburta saÄ«sinÄjumi (pie Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼a)
queries.sql: SELECT heading, human_key, content, e.id FROM examples x JOIN entries e ON e.id = x.entry_id WHERE content ~ '^(.* )?[a-zA-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄŒÅ Å½Ä¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–ÄÄ“Ä«ÅÅ«ÄÅ¡Å¾Ä£Ä·Ä¼Å†Å—]\.'  ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q51b
queries.caption: PiemÄ“ri, kuros ir vienburta saÄ«sinÄjumi (pie nozÄ«mes)
queries.sql: SELECT heading, human_key, content, e.id FROM examples x JOIN senses s ON x.sense_id = s.id JOIN entries e ON s.entry_id = e.id WHERE content ~ '^(.* )?[a-zA-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄŒÅ Å½Ä¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–ÄÄ“Ä«ÅÅ«ÄÅ¡Å¾Ä£Ä·Ä¼Å†Å—]\.'  ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q52
queries.caption: VÄrdu savienojumi 2 vietÄs â€“ pie Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼a un pie nozÄ«mesâ—
queries.sql: SELECT w.heading heading, w.human_key human_key, mwe.heading mwe_heading FROM entries w JOIN entry_relations er ON er.entry_2_id = w.id JOIN entries mwe ON er.entry_1_id = mwe.id JOIN sense_entry_relations ser ON ser.entry_id = mwe.id JOIN senses s ON ser.sense_id = s.id WHERE er.type_id = 3 AND s.entry_id = w.id AND w.type_id = 1 AND mwe.type_id = 4 ORDER BY w.heading, w.human_key, mwe.human_key

queries.name: q54
queries.caption: Paradigmas
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, legacy_no, caption, caption_en, data FROM paradigms ORDER BY human_key

queries.name: q55
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar 29-to paradigmu
queries.sql: SELECT e.heading, e.human_key, l.lemma FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id JOIN dict.paradigms p ON p.id = l.paradigm_id WHERE p.legacy_no = 29 ORDER BY heading, e.human_key, lemma

queries.name: q56
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar romieÅ¡u skaitÄ¼iem
queries.sql: SELECT e.heading, e.human_key, l.lemma FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE lemma ~ '^[IVXLCMD]+$' ORDER BY heading, e.human_key, lemma

queries.name: q57
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar izrunÄm
queries.sql: SELECT heading, human_key, lemma, l.data->>'Pronunciations' pron FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Pronunciations' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma
queries.sql3: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Pronunciations' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma
queries.sql2: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Pronunciations' IS NOT NULL OR l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Pronunciations' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q57b
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar izrunÄm (>1)
queries.sql: SELECT heading, human_key, lemma, l.data->>'Pronunciations' pron FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Pronunciations' IS NOT NULL AND jsonb_array_length(l.data->'Pronunciations' ) > 1 ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma
queries.sql3: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Pronunciations' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma
queries.sql2: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE l.data->'Pronunciations' IS NOT NULL OR l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Pronunciations' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q58b
queries.caption: IerobeÅ¾ojums 'KopÄ ar' vÄrda daÄ¼u Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼os, plus dziÄ¼ie SR
queries.where: entries.type_id = 5 AND (x.data #> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,Restriction}' = '"KopÄ ar"'::jsonb OR x.data #> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,AND}' IS NOT NULL OR x.data #> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,OR}' IS NOT NULL)

queries.name: q58c
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ierobeÅ¾ojums 'KopÄ ar' vÄrda daÄ¼u Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼os
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE e.type_id = 5 AND (l.data #>> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,Restriction}' = 'KopÄ ar' OR l.data #> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,AND}' IS NOT NULL OR l.data #> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,OR}' IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q58d
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes ierobeÅ¾ojums 'KopÄ ar' vÄrda daÄ¼u Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼os
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE e.type_id = 5 AND (l.data #>> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,Restriction}' = 'KopÄ ar' OR l.data #> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,AND}' IS NOT NULL OR l.data #> '{Gram,StructuralRestrictions,OR}' IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY heading, human_key, gloss

queries.name: q61a
queries.caption: IerobeÅ¾ojumu veidi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM grammar_restriction_types ORDER BY id

queries.name: q61b
queries.caption: IerobeÅ¾ojumu bieÅ¾umi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM grammar_restriction_frequencies ORDER BY compare_value, id

queries.name: q61c
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼a-Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼a saiÅ¡u tipi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entry_rel_types ORDER BY id

queries.name: q61d
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes-nozÄ«mes saiÅ¡u tipi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM sense_rel_types ORDER BY id

queries.name: q61e
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes-Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼a saiÅ¡u tipi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM sense_entry_rel_types ORDER BY id

queries.name: q61f
queries.caption: Synset saiÅ¡u tipi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM synset_rel_types ORDER BY id

queries.name: q61g
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼u tipi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM entry_types ORDER BY id

queries.name: q61h
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mu tipi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM lexeme_types ORDER BY id

queries.name: q61i
queries.caption: Ä€rÄ“jo saiÅ¡u tipi
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM external_link_types ORDER BY id

queries.name: q63
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss LIKE '%Ukrain%' ORDER BY heading, gloss

queries.name: q66a
queries.caption: SinonÄ«mkopas ar 1 elementu
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.synset_id IN (SELECT synset_id FROM dict.senses s2 WHERE s2.synset_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY s2.synset_id HAVING COUNT(*) = 1) ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q66b
queries.caption: SinonÄ«mkopas ar 1 elementu, kuras nav nevienas saites gals
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.synset_id IN (SELECT synset_id FROM dict.senses s2 WHERE s2.synset_id IS NOT NULL AND s2.synset_id NOT IN ((SELECT DISTINCT r1.synset_1_id FROM dict.synset_relations r1 ) UNION (SELECT DISTINCT r2.synset_2_id FROM dict.synset_relations r2)) GROUP BY s2.synset_id HAVING COUNT(*) = 1) ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q66c
queries.caption: TukÅ¡as sinonÄ«mkopas, kuras ir saites gals
queries.sql: SELECT * FROM dict.senses s JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE s.synset_id IN (SELECT synset_id FROM dict.senses s2 WHERE s2.synset_id IS NOT NULL AND s2.synset_id NOT IN ((SELECT DISTINCT r1.synset_1_id FROM dict.synset_relations r1 ) UNION (SELECT DISTINCT r2.synset_2_id FROM dict.synset_relations r2)) GROUP BY s2.synset_id HAVING COUNT(*) = 1) ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q69
queries.caption: WordNet vÄrdi bez paradigmas
queries.sql: SELECT DISTINCT lemma, human_key, heading, e.id FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id JOIN lexemes l ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE s.synset_id IS NOT NULL AND l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND e.type_id = 1 ORDER BY lemma, e.id

queries.name: q70a
queries.caption: IerobeÅ¾ojumi bez tipa, Å¡Ä·irklÄ«â—â—
queries.sql: SELECT sr, human_key, heading, e.id id FROM admin.sr_e r JOIN entries e ON e.id = r.id WHERE sr->'Restriction' IS NULL ORDER BY e.id;

queries.name: q70b
queries.caption: IerobeÅ¾ojumi bez tipa, nozÄ«mÄ“â—â—
queries.sql: SELECT sr, human_key, heading, gloss, e.id id FROM admin.sr_s r JOIN senses s ON s.id = r.id JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE sr->'Restriction' IS NULL ORDER BY e.id;

queries.name: q70c
queries.caption: IerobeÅ¾ojumi bez tipa, leksÄ“mÄâ—â—
queries.sql: SELECT sr, human_key, heading, lemma, e.id id FROM admin.sr_l r JOIN lexemes l ON l.id = r.id JOIN entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id WHERE sr->'Restriction' IS NULL ORDER BY e.id;

queries.name: q71
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar noteiktu avotu
queries.sql: SELECT s.abbr, e.human_key, e.heading, e.id id FROM entries e JOIN source_links sl ON sl.entry_id = e.id JOIN sources s ON s.id = sl.source_id WHERE s.id = @@@source_id@@@ ORDER BY e.id;

fields.label: Avots
fields.name: source_id
fields.sql: SELECT id val, CONCAT(abbr, ' - ', CASE WHEN length(title) > 100 THEN concat(substring(title, 1, 100), '...') ELSE title END) caption FROM sources ORDER BY abbr

queries.name: q72
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar celmu variantiem
queries.sql: SELECT heading, human_key, lemma, stem1, stem2, stem3 FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE stem1 LIKE '%,%'or stem2 LIKE '%,%' or stem3 LIKE '%,%' ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q73a
queries.caption: IerobeÅ¾ojumi 'KopÄ ar' vÄrda daÄ¼as Å¡Ä·irklÄ«, nozÄ«mÄ“â—
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, e.id, sr FROM admin.sr_s sr_s JOIN senses s ON sr_s.id = s.id JOIN entries e ON s.entry_id = e.id WHERE e.type_id = 5 AND sr->>'Restriction'='KopÄ ar' ORDER BY e.id;

queries.name: q73b
queries.caption: IerobeÅ¾ojumi 'KopÄ ar' vÄrda daÄ¼as Å¡Ä·irklÄ«, leksÄ“mÄâ—
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, e.id, sr FROM admin.sr_l sr_l JOIN lexemes l ON sr_l.id = l.id JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE e.type_id = 5 AND sr->>'Restriction'='KopÄ ar' ORDER BY e.id;

queries.name: q74a
queries.caption: VÄrdi ar burtiem Å— Å y, kam nav karogu 'RakstÄ«ba' vai 'Valoda'
queries.sql: SELECT lemma, heading, human_key, e.id FROM lexemes l join entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE lemma ~ '[ÅŒÅÅ—Å–yY]' AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Valoda' IS NULL AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'RakstÄ«ba' IS NULL ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q74b
queries.caption: VÄrdi ar burtiem Å— Å y, kam nav karogu 'RakstÄ«ba' vai 'Valoda', un nav lielais sÄkumburts
queries.sql: SELECT lemma, heading, human_key, e.id FROM lexemes l join entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE lemma ~ '^[^A-ZÄ€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÄ¢Ä¶Ä»Å…Å–ÄŒÅ Å½].*[ÅŒÅÅ—Å–yY]' AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Valoda' IS NULL AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'RakstÄ«ba' IS NULL ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q75
queries.caption: VÄrda daÄ¼u leksÄ“mas ar paradigmÄm
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE l.paradigm_id IS NOT NULL AND e.type_id = 5 ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q76
queries.caption: VÄrda daÄ¼u leksÄ“mas ar karogiem 'VÄrdÅ¡Ä·ira' vai 'Kategorija'
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, e.id, lemma, l.data->'Gram'->'Flags' flags FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE (l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'VÄrdÅ¡Ä·ira' IS NOT NULL OR l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Kategorija' IS NOT NULL) AND e.type_id = 5 ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q77
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes, kurÄs varÄ“tu bÅ«t taksoni
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, gloss FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss ~ '\("[A-Z].+"\)' AND gloss !~ '[Pp]ilsÄ“ta' AND gloss !~ '[Aa]pdzÄ«vota' AND gloss !~ '[Aa]pgabals' AND gloss !~ '[Aa]ugstiene' AND gloss !~ '[Å Å¡]tat[sÄ]' AND gloss !~ '[Tt]eritor' AND gloss !~ '[Aa]dministrat' ORDER BY gloss, human_key, e.id;

queries.name: q78
queries.caption: Visas (netukÅ¡Äs) nozÄ«mes alfabÄ“tiskÄ secÄ«bÄ
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, gloss FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss IS NOT NULL AND length(gloss) > 0 ORDER BY lower(gloss), human_key, e.id;

queries.name: q78b
queries.caption: NozÄ«mes ar tukÅ¡u skaidrojumu
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, gloss FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss IS NULL OR length(gloss) = 0 ORDER BY lower(gloss), human_key, e.id;

queries.name: q80
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i, kuru pamatleksÄ“mai ir adverba paradigma
queries.sql: SELECT e.id, e.heading, e.human_key FROM entries e JOIN lexemes l ON e.primary_lexeme_id = l.id WHERE l.paradigm_id in (21, 51) ORDER BY heading, human_key, e.id

queries.name: q81
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar paradigmu adjdef-f1 vai adjdef-f2, bet bez pamatformas morforÄ«kiem
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma, p.human_key paradigm FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id JOIN paradigms p ON l.paradigm_id = p.id WHERE p.legacy_no IN (40, 41) AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Pamatforma morforÄ«kiem' IS NULL ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q82
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar vÄrdÅ¡Ä·iru darbÄ«bas vÄrds vai divdabis, bet ar Ä«paÅ¡Ä«bas vai apstÄkÄ¼a vÄrda paradigmu, un bez pamatformas morforÄ«kiemâ—
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma, p.human_key paradigm FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id JOIN paradigms p ON l.paradigm_id = p.id WHERE p.legacy_no IN (13, 14, 40, 41, 30, 54, 21, 51, 42, 43, 52, 53) AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'VÄrdÅ¡Ä·ira' IN ('Divdabis', 'DarbÄ«bas vÄrds') AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Pamatforma morforÄ«kiem' IS NULL ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q84
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i, kuriem ir vairÄkas bezdatu saites uz vienu un to paÅ¡u avotuâ—
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, id FROM entries e WHERE id IN (SELECT entry_id FROM source_links WHERE data IS NULL GROUP BY entry_id, source_id HAVING count(*) > 1) ORDER BY heading, human_key ;

queries.name: q87
queries.caption: SinsetÄ ir vairÄkas viena Å¡Ä·irkÄ¼a nozÄ«mesâ—
queries.sql: WITH bp AS (SELECT entry_id, synset_id FROM senses WHERE synset_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY entry_id, synset_id HAVING count(*) > 1) SELECT heading, human_key, gloss, bp.synset_id y_id, s.hidden s_hidden FROM bp JOIN entries e ON e.id = bp.entry_id JOIN senses s ON s.entry_id = bp.entry_id AND s.synset_id = bp.synset_id ORDER BY bp.entry_id, bp.synset_id, gloss;

queries.name: q88a
queries.caption: ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrdi bez paradigmas
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND e.type_id = 1 AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' = 'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrds' ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q88b
queries.caption: ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrdi bez paradigmas (vietvÄrdi)
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND e.type_id = 1 AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' = 'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrds' AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids' = 'VietvÄrds' ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q88c
queries.caption: ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrdi bez paradigmas (nevietvÄrdi)
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND e.type_id = 1 AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' = 'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrds' AND (l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids' != 'VietvÄrds' OR l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids' IS NULL) ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q88c2
queries.caption: ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrdi bez paradigmas (nullvÄrdi)
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND e.type_id = 1 AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' = 'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrds' AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids' IS NULL ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q88d
queries.caption: ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrdi bez paradigmas (MWE)
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND e.type_id = 4 AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' = 'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrds' ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q88e
queries.caption: ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrdi bez Ä«paÅ¡vÄrdaâ—
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' IS NULL AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q88f
queries.caption: ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrdi bez veidaâ—
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' = 'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrds' AND l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids' IS NULL ORDER BY lemma, e.id;

queries.name: q88g
queries.caption: ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrdi talkai â€“ reversais saraksts
queries.sql: SELECT e.human_key human_key, heading, e.id, lemma, p.human_key paradigm FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id LEFT JOIN paradigms p on p.id = l.paradigm_id WHERE e.type_id = 1 AND (l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->>'LietvÄrda tips' = 'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrds' OR l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'ÄªpaÅ¡vÄrda veids' IS NOT NULL) ORDER BY reverse(lemma), e.id;

queries.name: q89
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar ..â—
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, gloss FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss ~ '\.\.' AND gloss !~ '\.\.\.' ORDER BY lower(gloss), human_key, e.id;

queries.name: q90
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar dÄ«vainu pÄ“dÄ“jo simbolu, ieskaitot '!' un '?'
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, gloss FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss !~ '[a-zA-ZÄÄ“Ä«ÅÅ«Å¡Å¾ÄÄ£Ä¼Å†Ä·Ä€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÅ Å½ÄŒÄ¢Ä»Å…Ä¶\.\)>%]$' AND gloss IS NOT NULL AND gloss <> '' ORDER BY lower(gloss), human_key, e.id;

queries.name: q90b
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar dÄ«vainu pÄ“dÄ“jo simbolu, neskaitot '!' un '?' â—
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, gloss FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss !~ '[a-zA-ZÄÄ“Ä«ÅÅ«Å¡Å¾ÄÄ£Ä¼Å†Ä·Ä€Ä’ÄªÅŒÅªÅ Å½ÄŒÄ¢Ä»Å…Ä¶\.\)>%\?!]$' AND gloss IS NOT NULL AND gloss <> '' ORDER BY lower(gloss), human_key, e.id;

queries.name: q91
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas, kam ir ierobeÅ¾ojums ar tipu "FormÄ/atvasinÄjumÄ", bez bieÅ¾uma un ar karodziÅ†u "Skaitlis: Vienskaitlis"
queries.sql: SELECT e.id, human_key, heading, lemma FROM admin.sr_l r JOIN lexemes l ON r.id = l.id JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE sr->>'Restriction' = 'FormÄ/atvasinÄjumÄ' AND sr->'Value'->'Flags'->>'Skaitlis' = 'Vienskaitlis' AND sr->'Frequency' IS NULL ORDER BY heading, e.human_key, lemma

queries.name: q92
queries.caption: Skaidrojumi ar mazo sÄkumburtu un pieturzÄ«mi '.', '!' vai '?' beigÄs â—
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, gloss FROM senses s JOIN entries e ON e.id = s.entry_id WHERE gloss ~ '^\(?[a-zÄÄ“Ä«ÅÅ«Å¡Å¾ÄÄ£Ä¼Å†Ä·].*[\.!\?]$' ORDER BY lower(gloss), human_key, e.id;

queries.name: q93
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas bez paradigmas, ar avotu MLVV, nav apvidvÄrds
queries.sql: SELECT human_key, heading, e.id, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e on l.entry_id = e.id JOIN source_links sl on sl.entry_id = e.id WHERE sl.source_id = 302 AND e.type_id = 1 AND l.paradigm_id IS NULL AND (l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Lietojums' IS NULL OR NOT l.data->'Gram'->'Flags'->'Lietojums' @> '["ApvidvÄrds"]') ORDER BY heading, human_key, lemma

queries.name: q95
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar jebkÄdiem ierobeÅ¾ojumiem
queries.sql: SELECT id, heading, human_key FROM entries WHERE data->'Gram'->'StructuralRestrictions' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key

queries.name: q96
queries.caption: VienburtÄ«gas leksÄ“mas
queries.sql: SELECT e.id, human_key, heading, lemma FROM lexemes l JOIN entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE length(lemma) < 2 ORDER BY heading, e.human_key, lemma

queries.name: q97
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar vietniekvÄrda paradigmu
queries.sql: SELECT e.heading, e.human_key, l.lemma FROM dict.lexemes l JOIN dict.entries e ON e.id = l.entry_id JOIN dict.paradigms p ON p.id = l.paradigm_id WHERE p.legacy_no = 25 ORDER BY heading, e.human_key, lemma

queries.name: q98
queries.caption: LeksÄ“mas ar divdabja tipu ierobeÅ¾ojumos
queries.sql: SELECT e.id, e.heading, e.human_key, l.lemma FROM admin.sr_l v JOIN dict.lexemes l ON v.id = l.id JOIN dict.entries e ON l.entry_id = e.id WHERE sr->'Value'->'Flags'->'Divdabja veids' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, e.human_key, lemma

queries.name: q999
queries.caption: Å Ä·irkÄ¼i ar
queries.sql: SELECT *, e.data->'Gram'->'Leftovers' value1 FROM dict.entries e WHERE e.data->'Gram'->'Leftovers' IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heading, human_key
